urls.description: Only Non-Stop Service Between North America and Thailand Four-times weekly, seasonal flights from YVR until Mar. 26 MONTREAL, Dec. 2, 2022 /CNW Telbec/ - A celebration was held at Vancouver...

data.text:

data.text:

urls.title: Air Canada fosters the next generation to enter the aviation industry
urls.description: In recent weeks, Air Canada has hosted a series of events that aim to provide students and young professionals a glimpse of the wide-ranging careers in aviation and encourage them to pursue...

data.text:
We are proud to support the next generation of young women interested in STEM. We recently hosted dozens of students to learn about specialized aviation careers & we held a hackathon for uni students to develop solutions to real-world challenges. 

More: https://t.co/46ujjd4QON https://t.co/9s96xPUg44

urls.title: Leave Less - Overview
urls.description: Air Canada recognizes that we must do our part to minimize our environmental footprint. We are committed to a net-zero emissions goal from all global operations by 2050 by continuing to leave less and do more. Explore how we’re flying towards a greener future. Air Canada takes great pride in being a global airline. With that, however, comes global responsibilities and people rightly look to us to help solve the challenges facing our planet. For our company and industry, this is probably no more pertinent

urls.title: Laisser moins – Aperçu
urls.description: À Air Canada, nous sommes conscients que nous devons prendre des mesures pour réduire notre empreinte écologique. Nous nous sommes donné un objectif de carboneutralité de toutes nos activités à l’échelle mondiale d’ici 2050 en continuant de laisser moins et d’en faire plus. Découvrez comment nous nous envolons vers un avenir plus vert. Air Canada est extrêmement fière d’être une société aérienne mondiale. urls.title: Air Canada Invests in Canadian Technology that Captures Carbon Directly from the Air to Fight Climate Change
urls.description: Air Canada today announced an equity investment/loan of $6.75 million into Canadian climate solutions company Carbon Engineering (CE). The investment supports the advancement of CE's Direct Air...

data.text:
We have committed to a goal of net-zero emissions by 2050 & created a $50M fund to support new technologies. Today, we are investing $6.75M into @CarbonEngineer to further advance Direct Air Capture technology at large, industrial scale. 

More: https://t.co/VbI9MPtRbA https://t.co/VplPMjhoTh

urls.title: Air Canada investit dans une technologie canadienne qui capte le carbone directement dans l'air afin de combattre les changements climatiques
urls.description: Partenariat avec Carbon Engineering pour faire progresser la décarbonisation de l'industrie du transport aérien MONTRÉAL, le 17 nov. 2022 /CNW Telbec/ - Air Canada a annoncé aujourd'hui...

data.text:
Pour atteindre la carboneutralité d’ici 2050, nous avons créé un fonds de 50 M$ pour les nouvelles technologies. Nous octroyons 6,75 M$ à @CarbonEngineer pour faire avancer la technologie de captage direct du carbone à grande échelle industrielle. 
Plus : https://t.co/pi19eXhQIG https://t.co/xS0uVzNUcI

urls.title: Air Canada Announces Bolloré Logistics as First Cargo Customer to Join Leave Less Travel Program
urls.description: Bolloré Logistics to purchase 620,000 litres of SAF, enabling them to reduce their Scope 3 GHG emissions. MONTREAL, Nov. 15, 2022 /CNW Telbec/ - Air Canada announced today that Bolloré Logistics...

data.text:
We welcome @BolloreLog as the first Air Canada Cargo customer to join our Leave Less Travel Program. Bollore is purchasing 620,000 litres of SAF to compensate GHG emissions from shipments with Air Canada Cargo. 
More: https://t.co/xBwf72S3h5 https://t.co/OOD5uwss1t

urls.title: Air Canada annonce que Bolloré Logistics est le premier client des services de fret à adhérer au programme de voyages Laisser moins
urls.description: Bolloré Logistics s'est engagé à acheter 620 000 litres de CAD pour réduire ses émissions de GES de portée 3. MONTRÉAL, le 15 nov. 2022 /CNW Telbec/ - Air Canada a annoncé aujourd'hui que...

data.text:
Nous accueillons @BolloreLog comme premier client d’Air Canada Cargo à adhérer au programme de voyages Laisser moins. Bolloré a acheté 620 000 litres de CAD afin de compenser les émissions de GES produites par ses expéditions de fret.

En savoir plus : https://t.co/DVD2vL59vw https://t.co/BA0UZGOIKU
